splitAndLowercase

protected List<Word> splitAndLowercase(List<Word> words)
Lowercase each token, if desired, and split each token into a list of tokens (splitting on NE delim token), if desired.

setWordsToScore

protected void setWordsToScore(List<Word> words,
                               boolean complete)
Resets wordsToScore to the given ones, reversing them when the reverse flag is true, and adding sentence delimiters if not already present, when the completeness flag is true. Delegates to the superclass

Overrides:
setWordsToScore in class NgramScorer

logProb

public float logProb(int pos,
                     int len)
Calculates a log probability of a delineated substring of the strings to score using KenLM.

Overrides:
logProb in class NgramScorer
Parameters:
pos - The start position (inclusive) within the strings to score.
len - The length, starting from pos, of the string that should be used.

Overrides:

logProbFromNgram

protected float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff. (Assumes words in wordsToScore have already been converted to strings in stringsToScore, via call to prepareToScoreWords.)

Specified by:
logProbFromNgram in class NgramScorer
